title: Ep 48: The Ultimate 2018 Forever35 Gift Guide
itunes:title: Ep 48: The Ultimate 2018 Forever35 Gift Guide
itunes:subtitle: On this week’s episode, Kate and Doree present the first ever Forever35 gift guide for the holiday season. Whether you’re shopping for a skincare enthusiast, a kid, a friend, a partner, a pet, a parent, or yourself, they’ve got you covered.For a full ...
description:
On this week’s episode, Kate and Doree present the first ever Forever35 gift guide for the holiday season. Whether you’re shopping for a skincare enthusiast, a kid, a friend, a partner, a pet, a parent, or yourself, they’ve got you covered.

For a full list of items mentioned on this episode, please visit Forever35podcast.com.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group(password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website, Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Rothy’s - Go to Rothys.com and enter code FOREVER35 for free shipping.
  • Thrive Market - Go to ThriveMarket.com/forever35 for 25% off your first order.
  • Molekule - For $75 off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter promo code FOREVER35 at checkout.
  • Third Love - Go to ThirdLove.com/forever for 15% off your first purchase.
  • Care/Of - Visit TakeCareOf.com and use promo code FOREVER35, for 25% off your first month.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
